title: Anyone can compete in the 2022 UCI Cycling Esports World Championship (if you’re fast enough)
content:
There aren’t too many sports where any average Joe from around the world can jump right into the World Championships. But that’s basically what’s offered with the upcoming UCI Cycling Esports World Championships in February 2022. For the first time, every Level 5+ Zwifter who is auto-categorized by WTRL (World Tactical Racing Leagues) as a

The post Anyone can compete in the 2022 UCI Cycling Esports World Championship (if you’re fast enough) appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
